channel.title: Unequips Shield!
channel.description:
Hello! In my server I have received many complaints from my players saying that if you are wearing a One-Handed weapon (Whip for example) and a Shield/Defender and you equip another One-Handed weapon it unequips the shield... Even though the NEW weapon im equipping (Dragon Dagger for example) is one handed... It still unequips the shield... Any ideas on how to fix??
Here is a video -
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Lp7Q-L8ljs
Please help

item.title: Unequips Shield!
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Can you tell me what to search for?

Read full topic

item.title: Unequips Shield!
item.dc:creator: @Delta2 Delta_
item.description:
@Delta2 wrote:

Remove the remove( part for shields in the wear method.

Read full topic
